==========
PyVCFtools
==========


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/pyvcftools.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pyvcftools

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/pyvcftools/badge/?version=latest

VTools for manipulating vcfs doing genomics work


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://pyvcftools.readthedocs.io.
